H0.text: Sinhala is the official language of which country. India

H1.text: Sinhala is the official language of which country. Malaysia

H2.text: Sinhala is the official language of which country. Singapore

H3.text: Sinhala is the official language of which country. Ceilan

A4.text: Sinhala and Tamil are the two official languages.

A5.text: Sinhala is one of the official and national languages of Sri Lanka

A6.text: Sri Lanka accords official status to Sinhala and Tamil, with English as a recognised language.

A7.text: The main languages spoken in Sri Lanka are Sinhala and Tamil.

A8.text: Department of Official Languages, Sri Lanka

A10.text: He introduced the controversial Sinhala Only Act, recognising Sinhala as the only official language of the government.

A11.text: Sinhala is spoken by about 17 million people in Sri Lanka, more than 14 million of whom are native speakers.
